item.description: Singles and Couples dance and party to the Tom Pittman Band every Thursday Night at the Miyako Restaurant in Danvers Ma. A wide range of dance fusion music with Saxaphone back up and great vocals makes for lot's of enjoyment on and of the dance floor. The Asian cusine and exotic drinks are a pleasure. This is a night not to miss, come early and get a seat. Miyako's is located behind the Chillis Restaurant on Rt 1 South in Danvers Ma. Ask for Clint Guy and the North Shore Dance and Party Meet Up. No cover charge.
item.name: North Shore Dance and Party Meet Up at the Miyako in Danvers,MA
